entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Baccaro Point
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:13 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Baccaro Point 11:00 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023
Temperature: 3.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 70 %
Dewpoint: -1.2°C
Wind: SSW 43 km/h gust 52 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Rain showers or flurries beginning near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries or rain showers. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain showers or flurries changing to flurries in the morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas late in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 27 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 22 except minus 18 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 cm in the heaviest flurries. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 22 except minus 18 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Windy. High minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023
